gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Nets 120, Cavaliers 101
gameRecap.excerpt: The Nets defeated the Cavaliers, 120-101. Cam Thomas led the way for the Nets with 29 points (5-7 3PT FG), seven rebounds and five assists, while Mikal Bridges added 25 points (5-8 3PT FG), five rebounds and five assists in the victory. Georges Niang tallied 20 points (3-5 3PT FG) for the Cavaliers in the losing effort. The Nets improve to 26-39 on the season, while the Cavaliers fall to 41-23.
